mapper.select: select * from user_card_note where admin_id = #{adminId} and is_del = 0 order by RAND() limit 1

select distinct note.id, note.content, note.admin_id, note.is_del, note.create_time, note.update_time from user_card_note note left join user_note_tag_assoc assoc on assoc.note_id = note.id where note.admin_id = #{adminId} and note.is_del = 0
and note.content like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
and assoc.tag_id = #{tagId}
order by note.create_time desc,note.id desc
select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as noteDay, count(create_time) as count from user_card_note where is_del = 0 GROUP BY date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d');
